snippet: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits declined 6,000 to a seasonally adjusted 247,000 last week, the lowest reading since November 1973.
abstract: Labor Dept reports initial claims for state unemployment benefits fell 6,000 to seasonally adjusted 247,000 for week ended April 16, lowest level since November 1973.
lead_paragraph: Initial claims for state unemployment benefits declined 6,000 to a seasonally adjusted 247,000 last week, the lowest reading since November 1973.

headline.print_headline: Weekly Jobless Claims at Lowest Point Since 1973
